Table	Create Table
tasks	CREATE TABLE `tasks` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `householdId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `description` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `assignedTo` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `frequency` enum('once','daily','weekly','monthly','custom') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'once',
  `customFrequencyDays` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `enableRotation` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `dueDate` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `isCompleted` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `completedBy` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `completedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `completionPhotoUrls` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdBy` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `repeatInterval` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `repeatUnit` enum('days','weeks','months') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `requiredPersons` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `projectIds` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `skippedDates` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `completionFileUrls` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `nonResponsiblePermission` enum('full','milestones_reminders','view_only') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'full',
  `sharedHouseholdIds` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `assignedTo_new` json DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `tasks_householdId_households_id_fk` (`householdId`),
  KEY `tasks_assignedTo_household_members_id_fk` (`assignedTo`),
  KEY `tasks_completedBy_household_members_id_fk` (`completedBy`),
  KEY `tasks_createdBy_household_members_id_fk` (`createdBy`),
  CONSTRAINT `tasks_householdId_households_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`householdId`) REFERENCES `5dPSLyh58e9tDjPvGLCuzX`.`households` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `tasks_completedBy_household_members_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`completedBy`) REFERENCES `5dPSLyh58e9tDjPvGLCuzX`.`household_members` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `tasks_createdBy_household_members_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`createdBy`) REFERENCES `5dPSLyh58e9tDjPvGLCuzX`.`household_members` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=1770001
